summary: The module contains automated tests for the Dance Diffusion audio generation pipeline, including fast unit tests that verify dummy component setup, attention slicing, deterministic output, output format consistency, batch versus single inference equivalence, and checkpoint save/load functionality, as well as integration tests that confirm end‑to‑end generation works correctly in both full and half‑precision modes.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability, correctness, and hardware compatibility of the diffusion‑based audio generation pipeline before deployment, reducing regressions and guaranteeing consistent output across different precision settings.
